package.name: lily_bot
package.description: LilyBot is an autonomous 2-wheel differential drive robot powered by a Jetson Nano B01 running ROS Noetic on Ubuntu 20.04. Equipped with an Intel RealSense D435i depth camera, YDLIDAR X4 2D Lidar, and a Yahboom ROS Robot Expansion Board, it is capable of performing indoor AI-based tasks such as Active SLAM, Smart Navigation, and End-to-End Navigation. This package includes a high-fidelity digital twin with accurately modeled masses and inertias, enabling simulation and training with behavior closely matching the real robot.
package.author: Ali Hasan
Bashar Moalla
Yousef Mahfoud
